segments.text: So , what ’ s new in the kitchen ? That refrigerator is new , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I needed a large one . Before , I had a separate refrigerator and freezer , but this has both combined into one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s usual nowadays . You ’ Ve added a few shelves too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You know I ’ Ve been cooking more kind of food recently and I needed some extra space for spices and ingredients .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you buy new cupboards too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I didn ’ t . I gave them a really good clean , so they just look new . The worktop was in poor condition , so I had a new one added .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see that you have bought several new pots and pans and utensils .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . I need them to help me with these new dished I ’ m trying to make . I need a little more practice before I invite guests over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looking at the spice rack , I ’ d say you ’ Ve been learning how to make asian food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ Ve always likes Indian and thai food , so I ’ Ve been trying to make dishes from those countries . I ’ m pretty good at making curries now , but I still need practice at making thai food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Both kinds of food are becoming popular . Nowadays , it ’ s very easy to pick up the ingredients at the supermarket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you can stay for dinner . I need a guinea pig !
segments.speaker: S2
